   Will a looming tax on so-called "Cadillac" health insurance policies
   equate to a "devastating" tax hike on the middle class in Kentucky?

Steve Contorno
   By Steve Contorno July 23, 2014

Mitch McConnell claims 'devastating' tax increase on middle class looming due to
health care law

   Coal and health care are the two dominant themes in Kentucky’s hotly
   contested U.S. Senate race.

Our ruling

   On the news of a new CBO report, a McConnell spokeswoman said that the
   implementation of Obamacare as outlined in the report would mean
   "devastating tax hikes ... on middle-class Kentuckians."
